clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Mild inflammatory uptake in axillary lymph nodes region.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in axillary lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
recommendations: Consider lab tests to assess metabolic activity if indicated.
